TheRailgun:PlaceholderRelic2.NAME: Placeholder Relic 2
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, gain #b1 #yStrength.

TheRailgun:DefaultClickableRelic.NAME: Right-Clicky Relic
TheRailgun:DefaultClickableRelic.FLAVOR: The more you right-click it, the more orbs you've evoked in your lifetime.

TheRailgun:BottledPlaceholderRelic.NAME: Bottled Placeholder
DESCRIPTIONS: Choose a card. Whenever you take play any card, draw the chosen card.

TheRailgun:TokenRelic.NAME: Collector's Token
DESCRIPTIONS: Get a 50/50 shot of taking 1 damage or reducing your next fight's enemies HP to 1. NL Usable outside of combat only. Usable 3 times. Right-click to use.

TheRailgun:CoinRelic.NAME: Collector's Coin
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of the turn, channel up to three lightning orbs equal to your remaining energy.
